name: uptime-kuma
description: Uptime Kuma is a self-hosted monitoring and status page solution. It supports HTTP, ping, DNS, and more checks, sending notifications and rendering a beautiful status page for your services.
features: Multi-protocol monitoring: Monitor HTTP, HTTPS, TCP, ping, DNS, and more with flexible check types.
Status pages: Create beautiful public or private status pages to communicate service health to users.
Notifications: Send alerts via 90+ notification channels including email, Slack, Discord, and webhooks.
Response time tracking: Track and visualize response times with charts showing performance trends.
Certificate monitoring: Monitor SSL certificate expiration and receive alerts before certificates expire.
Uptime statistics: View uptime percentages and availability statistics for all monitored services.
Maintenance windows: Schedule maintenance windows to pause alerts during planned downtime.
Multi-user: Support multiple users with individual accounts and notification preferences.
Docker monitoring: Monitor Docker containers and receive alerts when containers stop or fail.
Keyword monitoring: Check for specific keywords in HTTP responses to verify content correctness.
Mobile app: Access monitoring dashboard from iOS and Android mobile apps.
API access: Integrate with other tools using the REST API for custom automation and reporting.
